type2_incorrect.reasoning: Error response format is {error: {code, message}} but client-side code expects data.error to be a string, not data.error.message
User createdAt field is empty string instead of ISO timestamp in createUser function
Task createdAt and updatedAt use Date.toString() instead of ISO timestamp format
Session expiresAt uses Date.toString() instead of ISO timestamp format
Password hashing uses bcrypt with 10 rounds instead of bcryptjs as specified in spec section 3.1

type3_extraneous.reasoning: Utility functions formatDate, debounce, and truncateString are not mentioned in specification and unused in codebase
Debug console.log statements for rendering tasks not specified in requirements
Debug console.log statements for task fetching and creation not specified
Debug console.log statements for task operations not specified
Debug console.log statement for user registration not specified
Debug console.log statement for user login not specified
Debug console.log statement for user logout not specified
Bulk operation functions clearCompletedTasks, deleteAllTasks, and toggleAllTasks not mentioned in API endpoints section 6.2
